title: Minecraft Classic
description: Build, explore, and survive in the classic Minecraft experience. Create your own world with blocks and let your imagination run wild.
Slide tiles, combine numbers, and reach the 2048 tile in this addictive puzzle game. Test your strategic thinking and planning skills.

title: Slither.io
description: Grow your snake by eating glowing orbs and other players. Become the longest snake on the server in this multiplayer snake game.

title: Temple Run 2
description: Run, jump, and slide through ancient temples while collecting coins and avoiding obstacles. How far can you run?

title: Chess
description: Play the classic game of chess against the computer or challenge your friends. Improve your strategy and tactical thinking.

title: Geometry Dash
description: Jump, fly, and flip your way through dangerous passages and spiky obstacles. Complete levels and unlock new characters.

title: Cookie Clicker
description: Click cookies to bake more cookies, buy upgrades, and become the ultimate cookie empire. An idle game that's strangely addictive.

title: Subway Surfers
description: Run, jump, and dodge through subway tunnels while collecting coins and power-ups. Escape from the inspector and his dog.

title: Word Search
description: Find hidden words in a grid of letters. Challenge yourself with different themes and difficulty levels.

title: Racing Game
description: Speed through challenging tracks, drift around corners, and compete for the fastest lap times in this exciting racing game.

title: Tetris
description: Arrange falling blocks to create complete lines and clear the board. The classic puzzle game that never gets old.

title: Pac-Man
description: Navigate through the maze, eat all the dots while avoiding the ghosts. The iconic arcade game that started it all.
